trans-unit.source: Contains information about a failed replication attempt.
trans-unit.target: 包含失敗的複寫嘗試的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of consecutive failures since the last successful replication.
trans-unit.target: 取得自上次成功複寫的連續失敗次數。

trans-unit.source: The number of consecutive failures since the last successful replication.
trans-unit.target: 上次成功複寫的連續失敗次數。

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time that the first failure occurred.
trans-unit.target: 取得第一次失敗，發生的時間與日期。

trans-unit.source: The date and time that the first failure occurred when replicating from the source server.
trans-unit.target: 日期和時間的第一次失敗時所發生的從來源伺服器複寫。

trans-unit.source: Gets the error code for the most recent failure.
trans-unit.target: 取得最近失敗的錯誤碼。

trans-unit.source: An HRESULT that contains the error code that is associated with the most recent failure.
trans-unit.target: 包含最近的失敗與相關聯的錯誤碼的 HRESULT。

trans-unit.source: This will be ERROR_SUCCESS if the specific error is unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 如果特定的錯誤是無法使用，這就是 ERROR_SUCCESS。

trans-unit.source: Gets the error message for the most recent failure.
trans-unit.target: 取得最近的失敗錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The error message for the most recent failure.
trans-unit.target: 最近的失敗的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the DNS name of the source server.
trans-unit.target: 取得來源伺服器的 DNS 名稱。

trans-unit.source: The DNS name of the source server.
trans-unit.target: 來源伺服器的 DNS 名稱。
